scenario_text.value:
You’re still hanging around? You’re too weak
to be here on your own.

Get your brother to protect you. Ah, but he
isn’t here now, huh? Too bad...

I, I don’t need Kaito.... I can do just fine
on my own...

Haha, you mean your spirit power? You know
that’s a total sham.

You’re just ignoring your insignificance.
Just accept it. Let yourself be protected.

Unnngh... No, stop... I don’t wanna be
protected forever...
Don’t worry, Miu. This Shakomon is a phony.

The Shakomon that hangs out with you would
never deny your power.

She knows how strong you are. There’s no way
she’d call you insignificant.
Oh... Yeah, you’re right. But then, this’s...?

(She said such awful things to Miu... If Kaito
were here she’d be a fine paste on the floor.)
